trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Petersburg
There were no other sightings in Petersburg on or around May 19th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside in my back yard @ 10 pm and seen what I thought to be a star or a plane. Then I realized it wasn't either. I know planes don't move fast in a zig zag motion. I got really scared and went back in the house.Then around 10:45 pm I went out the front door and seen 3 triangle shapes. in different spots. The lights kept dimming in and out. I am a stay at home mom I'm not nuts, scared to death actually because this isn't the first time I seen the "star" zigzag. I have seen it atleast 4 times over the last few months.As of right now 11 pm they are still out there.
Summary: moving fast,back and forth,light dimming then brighter
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
